text: (Shuaibu) jwatite: “Chisimu une ngusaka kuti nannombesye jumpepe mwa asikana ŵangu ŵaŵiliŵa, pakundumichila yaka nsano naitatu, nambo naga tinkwanisye likumi basi tikuŵe kusaka kwenu. Soni ngangusaka kunnonopeyechesya (pakuntupiya yaka). Timusimane – nasakaga Allah – kuti ndili mwa ŵandu ŵambone (ŵakwanisya chilanga).”
